SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cell extends Object implements Serializable
Represents cell in player's book for placing playable cards. Each cell maintains information about its position, availability, wall status, and the card placed on it.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Cell

      public Cell(int row, int column)
      Constructs a Cell object with specified row and column indices. Initially sets the cell as unavailable, without a wall, and without any card placed.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the cell in the grid.
      column - The column index of the cell in the grid.

  • Method Details

    • updateCell

      public void updateCell(PlayableCard newCard)
      Updates the cell with a new playable card, marking it as unavailable for further placement.
      Parameters:
      newCard - The new playable card to be placed on the cell.

    • setPlacementOrder

      public void setPlacementOrder(int placementOrder)
      Sets the order of placement for the card on the cell.
      Parameters:
      placementOrder - The order of placement to set.

      public boolean isAvailable()
      Checks if the cell is available for placing a card.
      Returns:

      numColumns - The number of columns in the grid.

    • getCardPointer

      public PlayableCard getCardPointer()
      Retrieves the playable card currently placed on this cell.
      Returns:
      The playable card placed on this cell, or null if no card is placed.
